animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very large animal
🥜 I am known for my love of a certain nut
💧 I use my trunk to drink water

animal.question: I meow and love to chase mice. I purr when I am happy. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈‍⬛ I am a common household pet
🥛 I love to drink milk
🧶 I like to play with yarn

animal.question: I say 'Woof!' and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love chewing on bones
🐕 I'm often a loyal companion
🎾 I enjoy chasing balls

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse, but I'm not
🌿 I eat grass and leaves
⚫⚪ My pattern helps me camouflage

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am related to humans
🌴 I live in the jungle
🍌 I peel my food before eating it

animal.question: I roar and am known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane around my head
🍖 I am a predator
🦁 I am a symbol of strength and courage

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal on Earth
🌿 My favorite food is acacia leaves
🌍 I live in Africa

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change colors to blend in
🌊 I squirt ink to escape danger
🪸 I live in coral reefs

animal.question: I waddle and lay eggs. I live in cold places. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I can't fly, but I'm a great swimmer
🧊 I live in Antarctica
🐟 I eat mostly fish

animal.question: I am a reptile with a hard shell on my back. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live for a very long time
🥬 I like to eat leafy greens
🏡 I can retract my head into my shell

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. I help the flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Plants need me.
🌱 I come from clouds.
☔️ I am wet.

weather.question: I am hot and bright, and I disappear at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I help you see during the day.
🔥 I am very warm.
☀️ I am in the sky.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep.
🌬️ I am made of water droplets.
☁️ I can block the sun.

weather.question: I come down in winter, and I'm cold and white. You can build a snowman with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am frozen water.
❄️ I fall from the sky.
⛄ Kids love to play with me.

weather.question: I'm a strong, spinning wind that can cause damage. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I have a swirling shape.
🏠 I can knock down houses.
🌬️ People take shelter from me.

weather.question: I’m a colorful arc that appears after a rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
🌧️ I appear after a storm.
✨ I am an optical and meteorological phenomenon

weather.question: I am frozen raindrops falling from the sky. I can be quite hard!

hints.text: 🧊 I'm a type of precipitation
⚽ I can be small or large, sometimes like a golf ball
🤕 Sometimes I hurt when I fall on you!

weather.question: I am a measure of how hot or cold something is. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ Doctors use me to check if you are sick
🧊 You can measure me in Celsius or Fahrenheit.
🔥 I am what tells you whether you need a jacket or shorts.

weather.question: I am a large body of air with similar temperature and moisture throughout. I influence the weather.

hints.text: 💨 I can be warm or cold, dry or humid.
🗺️ I cover large areas of land or water.
🍃 I move around and bring different weather conditions.

weather.question: I am a boundary separating two masses of air. Different weather happens when I pass.

hints.text: 〰️ I can be cold, warm, stationary, or occluded.
🌦️ Rain, storms, or clearing skies can happen when I go by.
🌍 Meteorologists study me to predict the weather
